user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart

The first product is a USB-C to USB-A male adapter pack priced at $6.99, with a 3+ day shipping option. Below it is another sponsored product, a USB charger cable priced at $44.99. There is also a search bar at the top and a cart icon.

click on the address bar located at the top middle.

click on the search icon (a magnifying glass) located at the middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the cancel button located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the "Remove" button located at the lower left.
click on the cart icon located at the middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the "usb-b" search result located at upper left.

The next logical step is to clear the cart fully before adding a new item.
